organic_results.title: The concept of a self-fulfilling prophecy
organic_results.snippet: The recent deluge of experiments on teacher expectations has failed to provide consistent and unambiguous findings. It is argued in this paper that one of the primary reasons for the inconsistent results is the failure to understand the roots and workings of the self-fulfilling prophecy. Seven aspects of the self-fulfilling prophecy are discussed under the rubric of two broad categories. The first category views changes in the environment as requisite for changes in interpersonal perceptions. The second category, consistent with research on …
